title: Lily Allen and Stranger Things' star David Harbour confirm romance
text:
Yep, they’re official (Picture: Mega)

If you needed proof that David Harbour and Lily Allen are a couple, the pair has kindly provided evidence on a silver platter.

The Stranger Things actor and the Smile singer shared a kiss while out and about in New York City, confirming their budding romance.

Lily, 34, flew out to NYC to support the 44-year-old star as he hosted Saturday Night Live, and afterwards, they took a stroll through Manhattan’s downtown area.

And while on their walk, Lily and David enjoyed a touch of PDA, as the new couple passionately kissed in the street, held hands and cuddled.

Lily flew to NYC to support David on SNL (Picture: LRNYC / MEGA)

Rumours began to swirl about their relationship back in August (Picture: LRNYC / MEGA)

David couldn’t keep his hands off Lily (Picture: INSTAR Images)

Yep, these two are official.

David, dressed in a navy jacket and sunglasses, couldn’t keep his hands off Lily, who accessorised her casual jeans and sweater outfit with a purple Chanel handbag, with the Netflix star seen planting a kiss on her cheek.

The couple stopped for lunch at Cafe Gitane before visiting a jewellery store in Chinatown.

We reckon it’s a bit soon for rings, so let’s give them the benefit of the doubt and assume Lily was bagging some new earrings.

The pair seem pretty loved up (Picture: LRNYC / MEGA)

David is believed to have split from Alison Sudol earlier this year (Picture: LRNYC / MEGA)

We love this new romance (Picture: LRNYC / MEGA)

We first wondered what was going on between Lily and David back in August, when the unlikely pals were seen leaving a London theatre together.

Things stepped up a notch when the pair were seen enjoying the Hughie Fury vs Alexander Povetkin boxing match at the O2 Arena.

Lily, who has two daughters from her marriage to Sam Cooper, had been single since splitting from boyfriend of three years Meridian Dan.

Speaking in January on Elizabeth Day’s How To Fail podcast, the Sheezus singer said: ‘I’ve always had a boyfriend. I don’t at the moment. I’m single for the first time since I was about 15.

What’s going on here then? (Picture: LRNYC / MEGA)

Lily last dated Meridian Dan (Picture: LRNYC / MEGA)

‘It’s just been bad news after bad news after bad news and I think that fact that I haven’t called him and been like, “Hey, wanna come around for a cuddle?” means that it’s big for me, because ordinarily, when things get difficult, I do need to have somebody around to share those problems. ‘So the fact that I’m dealing with it all on my own, I’m growing up.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

Lily, who officially divorced from Cooper in 2018, three years after their split, previously dated The Chemical Brothers’ Ed Simons, and alleged she once had an affair with Liam Gallagher.

Meanwhile, David is believed to have split from Fantastic Beasts actress Alison Sudol earlier this year, and shared a dog Gertie with the 34-year-old.

Harbour, best known for playing Hopper on Stranger Things, previously dated Riviera star Julia Stiles for four years between 2011 and 2015.

Before this, he was engaged to Forgetting Sarah Marshall actress Maria Thayer.
